alert.note: Alert for South Washington Cascade Foothills (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 02 at 4:02AM PST until January 03 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 PM PST MONDAY ABOVE 1500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 24 inches, heaviest above 2000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...South Washington Cascade Foothills above 1500 feet. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 4 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very hazardous. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage.
info.instruction: Keep an eye on the forecast for updates on the situation. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Slow down and allow extra time when travelling. Practice your winter safety rules. Keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your car in case of emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
